mapper.insert: insert into purchaseorder (purchaseid, supplierid, goodid, purchaseprice, purchasetime, amount, isreturn) values (null, #{supplierid}, #{goodid}, #{purchaseprice}, #{purchasetime}, #{amount}, #{isreturn})
mapper.delete: delete from purchaseorder where purchaseid = #{id}; alter table purchaseorder auto_increment 1;
mapper.select: select * from purchaseorder where purchasename LIKE CONCAT('%', #{purchasename, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
